### API

Data 属性说明

| 属性 | 说明 | 类型 | 可选值 | 默认值 |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| text | 文字说明 | `String`\|`Number` | - | - |
| width | 进度条宽度 | `Number` | - | `'value'` |
| percentage | 进度值 | `Number` | - | - |
| color | 进度条颜色 | `String` | `green`\| `red`\|` orange`\| `yellow` | `red` |
| trackColor | 进度条背景色 | `String` | - | `#eeeeee` |
